title: RVNL emerges as the lowest bidder for IRCON contract, second order win within five days
summary: Shares of Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd (RVNL) are in focus on Tuesday, May 20, after the company won its second order within five days on Monday. RVNL emerged as the lowest bidder for an order from IRCON International Ltd. The contract is for the supply of various signalling, telecommunications and electronic in-motion weigh bridge (EIMWB) materials.

title: Heritage Foods eyes protein market
summary: Heritage Foods, the Hyderabad-based dairy products company, is looking to tap the protein opportunity. Though some of its products already contain proteins, the company hopes to launch enhanced protein products soon, according to Srideep N Kesavan, CEO of Heritage Foods Ltd. The company has lined up a capital expenditure of ₹400 crore in the next 18-24 months.

title: Borosil Renewables to invest ₹950 crore to expand solar glass unit in Gujarat by 600 TPD
summary: Borosil Renewables Ltd has laid the foundation stone for a ₹950-crore expansion project in Gujarat that has a solar glass production capacity of 600 tonnes per day (TPD) from the third quarter of financial year 2026-27.

title: Mahadev betting case: ED investigates EaseMyTrip CEO Nishant Pitti, says report
summary: The Enforcement Directorate (ED) has broadened its investigation into the Mahadev betting app scam, bringing Nishant Pitti, CEO of the listed travel company Easy Trip Planners Ltd (EaseMyTrip), under scrutiny, an Economic Times report said on Tuesday.

title: Foods & Inns consolidated net profit rises 338.43% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 15.09% to Rs 397.33 crore Net profit of Foods & Inns rose 338.43% to Rs 22.93 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 5.23 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Power Grid shares in focus on in-line Q4 show, Morgan Stanley maintains 'equal-weight'
summary: Public-sector firm Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd.'s shares will be in focus on Tuesday, May 20, after reporting flat profit growth for the three months ended March 31, 2025. Power Grid reported its financial results for the fourth quarter of FY2025, posting a slight 0.6 percent decline in net profit at Rs 4,143 crore compared to Rs 4,166 crore in the same quarter last year.

title: Gurugram real estate: Oberoi Realty to enter Gurugram with high-end luxury project inspired by Three Sixty West
summary: Mumbai-based Oberoi Realty is set to enter the Gurugram real estate market with a high-end luxury project, featuring apartments ranging from 5,000 to 8,000 sq ft, according to Vikas Oberoi, CMD of Oberoi Realty. Oberoi said the Gurugram project will be modeled after the company’s flagship luxury development, Three Sixty West, located in Mumbai’s Worli.

title: Quess Corp reports consolidated net loss of Rs 95.49 crore in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 3.38% to Rs 3656.42 crore Net loss of Quess Corp reported to Rs 95.49 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against net profit of Rs 94.38 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Vivo Bio Tech consolidated net profit rises 43.24% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 4.51% to Rs 12.29 crore Net profit of Vivo Bio Tech rose 43.24% to Rs 1.06 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 0.74 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Carysil consolidated net profit rises 19.64% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 7.16% to Rs 204.18 crore Net profit of Carysil rose 19.64% to Rs 18.58 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 15.53 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024. Sales rose 7.16% to Rs 204.18 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 190.53 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Kilitch Drugs (India) consolidated net profit rises 189.69% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 36.61% to Rs 61.23 crore Net profit of Kilitch Drugs (India) rose 189.69% to Rs 10.40 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 3.59 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Repro India consolidated net profit declines 62.08% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales decline 3.22% to Rs 123.06 crore Net profit of Repro India declined 62.08% to Rs 1.13 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 2.98 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: CMS Info Systems consolidated net profit rises 6.72% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales decline 1.28% to Rs 619.07 crore Net profit of CMS Info Systems rose 6.72% to Rs 97.56 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 91.42 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: New India Assurance Company consolidated net profit rises 15.33% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 4.11% to Rs 9352.45 crore Net profit of New India Assurance Company rose 15.33% to Rs 358.54 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 310.88 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Everest Industries consolidated net profit rises 40.44% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 4.75% to Rs 452.63 crore Net profit of Everest Industries rose 40.44% to Rs 7.64 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 5.44 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Marksans Pharma consolidated net profit rises 15.66% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 26.51% to Rs 708.46 crore Net profit of Marksans Pharma rose 15.66% to Rs 90.55 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 78.29 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Sun Pharma Advanced Research Company reports consolidated net loss of Rs 59.77 crore in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 64.19% to Rs 27.19 crore Net Loss of Sun Pharma Advanced Research Company reported to Rs 59.77 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against net loss of Rs 105.79 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: DLF consolidated net profit rises 39.26% in the March 2025 quarter
summary: Sales rise 46.50% to Rs 3127.58 crore Net profit of DLF rose 39.26% to Rs 1282.20 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 920.71 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024. Sales rose 46.50% to Rs 3127.58 crore in the quarter ended March 2025 as against Rs 2134.84 crore during the previous quarter ended March 2024.

title: Q4 Results Live Updates: Power Grid, DLF react to earnings; Hindalco, Dixon Tech report today
summary: Q4 Results Live Updates: Power Grid, DLF react to earnings; Hindalco, Dixon Tech report today By CNBCTV18.COM May 20, 2025 7:36 AM IST (Published) Q4 Results Live Updates: As many as 10 important names like Hindalco Industries, United Spirits, Dixon Technologies (India), JK Tyre, NHPC, Torrent Pharmaceuticals, Aster DM Healthcare, Max Healthcare, Whirlpool of India, Zydus Lifesciences will be reporting their earnings for the January to March period on Tuesday, May 20.

title: Q4 Results Live Updates: Power Grid, DLF react to earnings; Hindalco, Dixon Tech report today
summary: Q4 Results Live Updates: Power Grid, DLF react to earnings; Hindalco, Dixon Tech report today By CNBCTV18.COM May 20, 2025 7:42 AM IST (Updated) Q4 Results Live Updates: As many as 10 important names like Hindalco Industries, United Spirits, Dixon Technologies (India), JK Tyre, NHPC, Torrent Pharmaceuticals, Aster DM Healthcare, Max Healthcare, Whirlpool of India, Zydus Lifesciences will be reporting their earnings for the January to March period on Tuesday, May 20.
